"Since I've been here, I've not had to be too boisterous," Allen Iverson said. I pretty much go out there and lead by example. Tonight there's things I say when I need to say it. I kind of went off at halftime in the locker room because I was[ upset]. We started the game, I felt like we took their confidence, but going into the second quarter we gave them confidence right back by not playing, having any energy offensively. So when I came in, I kind of let everybody have it. The team needed the dressing down to maintain its steadiness.
